title: Charting Gold, Copper, and Natural Gas
text:
Right now, the commodities markets are providing some of the most interesting charts aroundLet's go to the charts to see what we can learn about the future price direction of gold, copper, and natural gasGold After trading sideways during the early part of the year, gold took off in late May, running from $1274 on May 21st to $1569 on September 2n...

description: Let's see what we can learn about the future price direction of these commodities.
authors: Let'S See What We Can Learn About The Future Price Direction Of These Commodities.
